document.full_text: cuba's ruling communist party meets on saturday for a congress expected to introduce possible future leaders and endorse groundbreaking economic reforms in what is one of the world's last one-party communist states.
document.title: cuban communist party congress looks to future
lines_and_colors: cuba's ruling communist party meets on saturday for a congress expected to introduce possible future leaders and endorse groundbreaking economic reforms in what is one of the world's last one-party communist states.
